snippet: The author Cheryl Strayed traced a grief-stricken hike of the Pacific Crest Trail in “Wild.” Here, she talks about hiking the trail again with her family.
abstract: Travel Q&A with author Cheryl Strayed, who wrote book Wild about her adventures hiking hiked the mountainous Pacific Crest Trail after the death of her mother and the end of her own marriage; Strayed discusses what it was like to hike the trail again, this time with a husband and their two children.
lead_paragraph: The author Cheryl Strayed traced a grief-stricken hike of the Pacific Crest Trail in “Wild.” Here, she talks about hiking the trail again with her family.

headline.seo: Cheryl Strayed, Author of ‘Wild,’ on Returning to Her Trail of Tears
headline.main: Returning to Her Trail of Tears
headline.print_headline: Returning To the Trail Of Her Tears
